item.title: Simple Chicken Killa Fetha collecter
item.dc:creator: @slinkyman24 slinkyman24
item.description:
@slinkyman24 wrote:

well im just starting scripting and im kinda gettin the hang of it so heres my first fighting script and i havent tested yet but if you can test for me and post that would be great thanks.

[scar]///////////////////////////////
// chikenkilla fetha collecta//
//1.kills chickens //
//2.collects fethers //
//3.Does not eat i will add //
// in next version //
///////////////////////////////

program Chiken_killa_fetha_collector;

{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
{.include SRL/SRL/Skill/Fighting.scar}

const chicken_color = post color here;//color of chicken
const feather_color = post color here;//make sure diff color than chicken
const food_color = post color here;// food color

Procedure Setup_SRL;
begin
setupsrl;
end;

Procedure Kill_chicken;
clickmscolor(chicken_color,true);
wait(4000)
endfight;
end;

Procedure pickup_feathers;
begin
clickmscolor(feather_color,true)
wait(3000)
end;

Procedure Find_Randoms;
begin
findnormalrandoms;
end;

begin
setup_SRL;
repeat
Kill_chicken;
pickup_feathers;
Find_Randoms;
until(false)
end;
end.
[/scar][br][size=1]Posted at: November 21, 2006, 04:24:56 PM[/size][hr]any replies??[br][size=1]Posted at: November 21, 2006, 08:13:45 PM[/size][hr]please comment

Read full topic
